info.name: Asimily
info.description:
**Asimily Insight** provides a RESTful API to allow 3rd party application developers to integrate their NAC, CMMS systems with Asimily Insight. These REST API functions provide access to device information such as IT parameters, medical parameters, security parameters, asset vulnerabilities (CVEs), asset anomalies, FDA recalls, and utilization among others.

The API enforces secure access through https and basic authentication. Contact your Asimily partner program representative to get access to a test environment and API credentials to start building your Asimily integration application.

item.name: Assets

query.description: The page number from the list of assets to return. This defaults to 0 if not specified
Number of records to return per page. This defaults to 15 if not specified.

request.description: Returns all Assets discovered in network

item.name: Assets belongs to specified IP Address within CIDR Range

query.description: The page number from the list of assets to return. This defaults to 0 if not specified
Number of records to return per page. This defaults to 15 if not specified.
IP Address with CIDR range or can specify IP address
IP Address with CIDR range or can specify IP address

request.description:
Returns filtered Assets records based on IP address or IP address CIDR selected in the specific column.

e.g.
- 10.16.40.158
- 10.16.0.0/16

query.description: The page number from the list of assets to return. This defaults to 0 if not specified
Number of records to return per page. This defaults to 15 if not specified.

request.description: Returns filtered Asset records based on *Mac Address* selected in the mac address column

query.description: The page number from the list of assets to return. This defaults to 0 if not specified
Number of records to return per page. This defaults to 15 if not specified.
Boolean parameter supports Yes / No values

request.description:
Returns filtered Asset records based on the Boolean value in the specific column.

Boolean values:
- Yes
- No

query.description: The page number from the list of assets to return. This defaults to 0 if not specified
Number of records to return per page. This defaults to 15 if not specified.
Number parameter supports greater than, less than and more options. For more information read API documentation

request.description:
Returns filtered assets records based on number filter parameter in the specific column. Append below operator string to filter the records. e.g. riskGte, or likelihoodLte

Number operators supported are:
Gte - Greater than or equal
Gtr - Greater than
Lte - Less than or equal
Lst - Less than

query.description: The page number from the list of assets to return. This defaults to 0 if not specified
Number of records to return per page. This defaults to 15 if not specified.
String params supports contains, starts with and ends with. For more information read API documentation

request.description:
Returns Assets with specified string parameter

Returns filtered assets records based on string filter in the specific column.

String operator supported:
```
<char>* - Starts with
*<char>* - Contains
*<char> - Ends with
```

query.description: The page number from the list of assets to return. This defaults to 0 if not specified
Number of records to return per page. This defaults to 15 if not specified.
Date format YYYY-MM-DD is supported

request.description: Returns Assets records based on date selected in the specific column. Date format YYYY-MM-DD is supported, 2022-05-20.

query.description: The page number from the list of assets to return. This defaults to 0 if not specified
Number of records to return per page. This defaults to 15 if not specified.
Repeat parameter name to filter based on multiple values
Repeat parameter name to filter based on multiple values

request.description:
Returns Assets with specified Pick List values

Filtered all the records based on selection of distinct value(s) from specific column

query.description: The page number from the list of assets to return. This defaults to 0 if not specified
Number of records to return per page. This defaults to 15 if not specified.
Specify the number of days

request.description: Returns filtered assets records based on days selected in the specific column. Days format ## days is supported, e.g 365 days

item.description:
# Introduction

Returns the asset records for all assets discovered in the network.

## Authentication

REST clients to authenticate themselves using basic authentication by providing Asimily API username and password.

## Filter data types

Filters supported belongs to below data type are supported:
- Boolean
- Number
- String
- Pick List
- IP Address
- Mac Address
- Date
- Days
